revisions.rev:
{{TOC float right}}Three '''CD collection albums''' have been released for ''[[Tsukuyomi -Moon Phase-]]'' in [[Japan]]. The first two releases contain the opening and ending themes, along with instrumental (or [[karaoke]]) versions of the songs. The third release was a soundtrack (though it was titled a "Best Collection"), which contains theme and incidental music from the series. This album was released in both regular and limited editions.
